activity.title: Chicago CityPASS®
activity.what_we_love:
Explore Chicago’s top attractions while saving up to 49% with Chicago CityPASS®! This all-in-one ticket gives you access to 5 must-see destinations, making your trip both convenient and budget-friendly.

Enjoy admission to the Shedd Aquarium and Skydeck Chicago, then customize your experience by choosing three additional attractions from an exciting lineup: Shoreline Sightseeing Architecture River Tour, Field Museum, 360 CHICAGO Observation Deck, Museum of Science and Industry, Art Institute of Chicago, or Adler Planetarium.

With 9 days to use your pass, you can explore at your own pace—whether you're admiring world-class art, diving into science and history, or soaking in breathtaking city views. Make the most of your Chicago visit with Chicago CityPASS®!

groups.content:
* Discover Chicago's best attractions at great savings and enjoy instant delivery of convenient mobile tickets
* Spend less and experience more when you save up to 49% at Chicago's top attractions
* Explore the city at your own pace and time with this pass that's valid for 9 consecutive days
* You can enjoy the city's landmarks, such as the Shedd Aquarium, Skydeck Chicago, and more
Please select an estimated redemption date. The date you select is for booking reference only

## What's included

- 9-day consecutive attraction pass
- Admission to: **5 attractions (2 pre-selected attractions and 3 attractions for you to choose)**
- Admission to: **Shedd Aquarium** – All-access admission, plus a 4-D experience (subject to availability)
- Admission to: **Skydeck Chicago** – Expedited entry

- **Includes a choice of admission to 3 of the following activities:**
- Admission to: **Shoreline Sightseeing Architecture River Tour**
- Admission to: **Field Museum** – All-access pass (specially ticketed exhibitions outside of All-Access Pass may be subject to additional charges)
- Admission to: **360 CHICAGO Observation Deck** - Fast pass entry admission
- Admission to: **Griffin Museum of Science and Industry** – Museum entry, plus one timed-entry experience to the Giant Dome Theater film or Motion Ride
- Admission to: **Art Institute of Chicago** – Fast pass admission to the permanent collection and non-ticketed special exhibitions
- Admission to: **Adler Planetarium** – Museum entry, plus 2 Sky Shows

## Not included


- Transport
- Other personal expenses

## Eligibility

- Children aged 0-11 must be accompanied by a paying adult
- Children aged 12+ will be charged the same rate as adults
- Some attractions may require you to stand in the main ticket line to secure a free/discounted child’s ticket
- **Free Admission Eligibility:**
- **Shedd Aquarium:** Free for children aged 0-2
- **Skydeck Chicago:** Free for children aged 0-2
- **Shoreline Sightseeing Architecture River Tour:** Free for children aged 0-2
- **Field Museum:** Free for children aged 0-2
- **360 CHICAGO Observation Deck:** Free for children aged 0-2
- **Griffin Museum of Science and Industry:** Free for children aged 0-2
- **Art Institute of Chicago:** Free for children aged 0-13
- **Adler Planetarium:** Free for children aged 0-2

## Confirmation

- You'll get confirmation within minutes. If you don't see any confirmation, reach out to our customer support.

## Cancelation policy


- Tickets can be used any time within the validity period. Refunds can't be made once it has been redeemed or has expired.
- If you've participated in at least one activity, visited at least one attraction or used one of the tickets, refunds can't be issued

## Additional information


- Re-entry is not allowed after you leave the venue
- Please refer to the venue's official website for more information about PWD accessibility

- Please plan ahead: Advance reservations are required at some attractions and capacity may be limited

## Usage validity

- The voucher is valid for 365 day(s) from the booking confirmation date. It expires at 23:59 on the last day

- Once redeemed, the voucher is valid for 9 consecutive days, including the first day of use

## Reservation required

- Please reserve as much in advance to participation as possible
- Reservation method:
- Website: [link](https://my.citypass.com/welcome)
- Visit my.citypass.com or download the My CityPASS® app to access your tickets, make reservations (if required), and view attraction details, including admission information
- Please note that reservations are required for entry to the Shedd Aquarium, Skydeck Chicago, Shoreline Sightseeing Architecture River Tour, 360 CHICAGO Observation Deck, and Griffin Museum of Science and Industry

## Opening hours

- For Shedd Aquarium, please refer to the [opening hours]() for details
- For Skydeck Chicago, please refer to the [opening hours](https://theskydeck.com/plan-a-visit/) for details
- For Shoreline Sightseeing Architecture River Tour, please refer to the [schedule](https://shorelinesightseeing.com/architecture-river-tour/) for details
- For Field Museum, please refer to the [opening hours](https://www.fieldmuseum.org/) for details
- For 360 CHICAGO Observation Deck, please refer to the [opening hours](https://360chicago.com/plan-your-visit) for details
- For Griffin Museum of Science and Industry, please refer to the [opening hours](https://www.msichicago.org/visit/museum-hours) for details
- For Art Institute of Chicago, please refer to the [opening hours](https://www.artic.edu/visit) for details
- For Adler Planetarium, please refer to the [opening hours](https://www.adlerplanetarium.org/visit/your-visit/) for details

## Voucher type

- Present your mobile voucher

## How to redeem

- Activate your pass by visiting your first attraction
- You can only enter each attraction once

- Your mobile ticket will be scanned for admission at each attraction you visit

## Address

- **Shedd Aquarium**
- 1200 S Lake Shore Dr, Chicago, IL 60605, United States
- Please refer to the [map](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Shedd+Aquarium/@41.8675766,-87.6166129,17z/data=!3m2!4b1!5s0x880e2b637f0dfc79:0xf2dd92cafc3aeb65!4m6!3m5!1s0x880e2b635fb775f9:0x32059de3df50fbdf!8m2!3d41.8675726!4d-87.614038!16zL20vMDJqdzB6?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDMwNC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D) for assistance
